daily_summary.headline: Chinese Spaceplane and G1 Aurora: A Day of Steady Space Activity

top_events.title: Long March 2F/G | Chinese Reusable Space Vehicle (probable 4th flight)
top_events.description: Potential 4th flight of China's secretive reusable spaceplane, a rare and technologically significant mission.
top_events.action: Follow updates for mission details and possible reentry sightings.

top_events.title: G1 Geomagnetic Storm Opportunity
top_events.description: Kp 5 (G1) aurora forecast for Feb 5, offering a good chance for aurora viewing at high latitudes (≥60°).
top_events.action: Prepare for aurora photography if skies are clear.

top_events.title: Falcon 9 | Starlink Group 6-103
top_events.description: Routine SpaceX Starlink launch, supporting global internet coverage. Notable for rapid booster reuse.
top_events.action: Watch the live stream for booster landing and Starlink deployment.

alerts.title: Chinese Reusable Space Vehicle Launch
alerts.message: The Long March 2F/G is scheduled to launch China's reusable spaceplane (probable 4th flight), a rare and technologically significant mission. Details about the payload remain classified.
alerts.action_required: Follow updates for mission details and possible reentry sightings.

opportunities.recommendation: Good viewing opportunity for high-latitude observers. Worth checking if you're above 60° latitude and skies are clear.
